reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A surprise find; converted from a former elegant residence. We had no reservation, but decided to spend one night in Modena on our drive between Cinque Terre and Venice. Found this hotel on Tripadvisor, and were pleasantly surprised. Among our favorite hotels from our trip. It's located an easy 10-minute drive to Modena's old town, and there's plenty of parking! Part of a very elegant Italian chain of hotels (Space Hotels); we'll definitely choose another from this chain on our next trip to Italy. The restaurant is supposedly very good, but we ate in old town. When we returned from dinner, several locals were still sitting around the restaurant after their dinner. Always a good sign when the locals eat there.
reviews.title: A great find, excellent value

reviews.text: This is an elegant and comfortable hotel. I have stayed on business several times and always find the staff friendly and efficient. The hotel was originally a private villa and retains many fine features. The rooms are small by US standards. One big plus point is the really outstanding restaurant. Although in the same building it's actually owned and operated separately. The hotel reception can make a booking for you. This is essential as the restaraunt is very small. Trust me the food is excellent. Also, if you buy a beer in the bar you get a huge variet y of free nibbles that almost amount to a meal. The hotel is in an commercial area on the outskirts of the city so a car is required.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband myself and two friends spent 6 nights at this hotel and we were all amazed at how great the staff were. Nothing was to much trouble for the reception girls, they booked cars, restaurants, and if they did not know anything there went onto the internet for us and made our stay just wonderful. Linda who looked after the bar was just great helpful and very pleasant. The breakfast was excellent and the dining room staff very good. Our rooms was kept very clean with nice bedlinen and good towels.
